---
title: Predicción diaria sobre el presidente resultante de la Comisión Europea tras las elecciones europeas del 26M.
---

¿Cómo de probable es que estos sean los gobiernos resultantes? 



_________________

```{r graph0, echo=FALSE, out.width = '20%'}

highchart() %>% 
  hc_xAxis(categories = gobierno_eu_19$datetime2, tickIntereu = 1) %>% 
  hc_add_series(name = "Manfred Weber (EPP)", data = gobierno_eu_19$`Manfred Weber (EPP)` , color = "#33a1e0") %>% 
  hc_add_series(name = "Frans Timmermans (PES)", data = gobierno_eu_19$`Frans Timmermans (PES)`, color= "#FF3827") %>% 
  hc_add_series(name = "Jan Zahradil (ECR)", data = gobierno_eu_19$`Jan Zahradil (ECR)`, color = "#1725c4") %>% 
  hc_add_series(name = "Viola Tomic (GUE)", data = gobierno_eu_19$`Viola Tomic (GUE)`, color= "#a02e2c") %>% 
  hc_add_series(name = "Guy Verhofstadt (ALDE)", data = gobierno_eu_19$`Guy Verhofstadt (ALDE)`, color= "#e8af04") %>% 
  hc_add_series(name = "Otro/a", data = gobierno_eu_19$`Otro/a`, color= "#8c8c8c") %>% 
  hc_tooltip(crosshairs = TRUE, backgroundColor = "#FBFEFF",
             shared = TRUE, borderWidth = 0, sort = TRUE,  table = TRUE)


```
